pkgmetadata.longdescription: Implementation of Estimating Binary Dependency from Marginal Data // Provides a maximum likelihood estimation method to recover the joint distribution of two binary variables using only marginal summary data from multiple studies. This approach allows for privacy-preserving estimation in settings where individual-level data are unavailable. The method is fully described in the manuscript by Shang, Tsao and Zhang (2025) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2505.03995: "Estimating the Joint Distribution of Two Binary Variables from Their Marginal Summaries".
